column4: why is it that i have 4GB of ram while ubuntu reports 3.8 GB ?
same reason you have a 320gb hard drive, but ubuntu only reports 300
the number hardware manufacturers give you is 1000bytes=1KB, 1KB is actually 1024, just like there are 1024MB in 1GB, etc...
windows lied to you so that you would feel warm and fuzzy inside
